summary: This is a new mod i am currently working on, Do you like playing a mage :) do you like every mage orientated. Do you fear thiers not enough to do as a mage then never fear this mod could be for you.
descriptionHtml:
This is a new mod i am currently working on, I think skyrim for mages gets boring as thier isnt enough to do so i plan to add a hell of alot of content. Main goal is a secret lost college of skyrim which will contain everything a mage needs along with all new npc\'s and i will be adding quests all mage orientated as time goes on.

-planned content-
-Grand college of skyrim
-npc\'s and quests within the college
-The great catacombs-Will be located inside the college itself and will be protected by a magical door, A quest will needed to be completed to access it. (will feature a variety of creatures and several chambers with dragons to test your skills in battle)
-Secret Garden-You will find every kind of ingrediant you need here
-The Hall of Arch-mages- (Dedicated the the 5 ancient arch-mages of the college) Each arch mage specialized in a different spell spec (destruction etc) A 6th spot will be left empty till you reach lvl 50 at which point a secret Quest will occur. 

Will update within a few weeks with my progress.
author: Sheppard1
